parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: millisecond.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The node ID.

*   For ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instances and PolarDB for MySQL clusters, this parameter is valid only for instances of the Cluster Edition. If you do not specify this parameter, the log details of the primary node is queried by default.
*   For PolarDB-X 2.0 instances, set this parameter to **polarx_cn** if the node is a compute node, or **polarx_dn** if the node is a data node.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Role
parameters.description:
The role of the node of the PolarDB-X 2.0 instance. Valid values:

*   \*\*polarx_cn\*\*: compute node
*   \*\*polarx_dn\*\*: data node

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: millisecond.
